name: ETL Data Loader Agent
description: Loads validated data into a target system (mock load for PoC) and stores a confirmation artifact.

authSchemes.description: No authentication required for this agent.

skills.name: Load Validated Data
skills.description: Loads transformed data based on validation report and saves confirmation to DB.

transformed_data_artifact_id.description: The database ID of the 'transformed_data' artifact.

validation_report_artifact_id.description: The database ID of the 'validation_report' artifact.

run_id.description: The unique ID for the current pipeline run.

artifact_db_id.description: The database ID of the created 'load_confirmation' artifact.

load_status.description: Status of the mock load operation.

rows_processed.description: Number of rows considered for loading.

rows_loaded.description: Number of rows actually 'loaded' (0 if aborted/failed).
